name: Distressed Damsel
description:
Oh man was this ever fun! The game wasn't even why I did it!

This is a little practice project for me on doing low-poly art.

I hope you enjoy and make sure to keep up with my games!

Note: This game will not be updated. It is done and was just for practice for me. But please still enjoy my art!

Made for the #WeeklyGameJam

Music:

klavo1985 for rave clip sample

zagi2 for judgment dragon loop

artsyangelee for girl/women sad crying sobbing
